mapper.insert: insert into pdk_sm_file (id, name, length, type, path, category, status, memo, create_time, ts, dr) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dr,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.update: update pdk_sm_file set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, length = #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ts = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select id, name, length, type, path, category, status, memo, create_time, ts, dr from pdk_sm_file
